sqlMap.select: select a.qna_no , b.member_name, a.qna_question ,a.qna_answer, a.qna_date from qna a, member b where a.customer_no = b.customer_no
sqlMap.update: update qna set qna_no=#qna_no#, qna_question=#qna_question#, qna_answer=#qna_answer# where qna_no=#qna_no#
sqlMap.insert: insert into qna (qna_no, customer_no, qna_question, qna_date) values (qna_no_seq.nextval, #customer_no#, #qna_question#, sysdate)
